history.proof: intros A T r p Hchain. induction Hchain. - apply domok_single. auto. - apply domok_concat. + shelve. + shelve. - shelve.

ctx: intros A T r p Hchain.
exceptions.exn: In environment A : Set x, y : Map A T : mEnsemble A r : mRelation A H : T x H0 : T y H1 : r x y Unable to unify "T x" with "T y".

ctx: intros A T r p Hchain.
exceptions.exn: Wrong bullet +: Current bullet + is not finished.

chat.content:
I will give you a Coq proof state, including both hypotheses and a specific goal and your need to prove it. Your response should be a singular code block of Coq proof, without any additional explanation or commentary. Follow to these guidelines:
Introduce variables using unique names to avoid any conflicts.
Keep each command distinct and separated, avoid concatenations like ';' or '[cmd|cmd]'.
Organize your proof with bullets like '-', '+', and '*' instead of braces ({, }). Shift to their double symbols like '--' and '++', when necessary.
Effectively use given premises, follow the syntax and structure demonstrated in the examples provided.

Example 1:

Hypotheses:
n, m: nat
IHn: m + n = n + m

Goal:
m + S n = S n + m

Proof:
```simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.```

Example 2:
Hypotheses:

Goal:
forall n m : nat, m + n = n + m

```intros n m. induction n.
- simpl. auto.
- simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.```

Sovle This Proof State:

Hypotheses:


Goal:
forall (A : Set) (T : mEnsemble A) (r : mRelation A) (p : prechain A), chain A T r p -> prechain_dom_ok A T p

Premises:
mRelation = fun A : Set => Map A -> Map A -> Prop : Set -> Type Argument scope is [type_scope]
Inductive prechain (A : Set) : Set := single : Map A -> prechain A | concat : prechain A -> Map A -> prechain A For prechain: Argument scope is [type_scope] For single: Argument scopes are [type_scope _] For concat: Argument scopes are [type_scope _ _]
prechain_dom_ok : forall A : Set, mEnsemble A -> prechain A -> Prop
chain : forall A : Set, mEnsemble A -> mRelation A -> prechain A -> Prop
mEnsemble = fun A : Set => Map A -> Prop : Set -> Type Argument scope is [type_scope]
domok_concat : forall (A : Set) (x : Map A) (T : mEnsemble A) (p : prechain A), T x -> prechain_dom_ok A T p -> prechain_dom_ok A T (concat A p x)
chain_ind : forall (A : Set) (P : mEnsemble A -> mRelation A -> prechain A -> Prop), (forall (x : Map A) (T : mEnsemble A) (r : mRelation A), T x -> P T r (single A x)) -> (forall (x y : Map A) (T : mEnsemble A) (r : mRelation A), T x -> T y -> r x y -> P T r (concat A (single A x) y)) -> (forall (x y : Map A) (z : prechain A) (T : mEnsemble A) (r : mRelation A), T y -> r x y -> chain A T r (concat A z x) -> P T r (concat A z x) -> P T r (concat A (concat A z x) y)) -> forall (m : mEnsemble A) (m0 : mRelation A) (p : prechain A), chain A m m0 p -> P m m0 p
prechain_dom_ok_ind : forall (A : Set) (P : mEnsemble A -> prechain A -> Prop), (forall (x : Map A) (T : mEnsemble A), T x -> P T (single A x)) -> (forall (x : Map A) (T : mEnsemble A) (p : prechain A), T x -> prechain_dom_ok A T p -> P T p -> P T (concat A p x)) -> forall (m : mEnsemble A) (p : prechain A), prechain_dom_ok A m p -> P m p
chain_single : forall (A : Set) (x : Map A) (T : mEnsemble A) (r : mRelation A), T x -> chain A T r (single A x)
chain_concat_m : forall (A : Set) (x y : Map A) (z : prechain A) (T : mEnsemble A) (r : mRelation A), T y -> r x y -> chain A T r (concat A z x) -> chain A T r (concat A (concat A z x) y)
chain_concat_s : forall (A : Set) (x y : Map A) (T : mEnsemble A) (r : mRelation A), T x -> T y -> r x y -> chain A T r (concat A (single A x) y)
prechain_incr_ind : forall (A : Set) (P : mRelation A -> prechain A -> Prop), (forall (x : Map A) (r : mRelation A), P r (single A x)) -> (forall (x : Map A) (r : mRelation A) (p : prechain A), r (prechain_last A p) x -> prechain_incr A r p -> P r p -> P r (concat A p x)) -> forall (m : mRelation A) (p : prechain A), prechain_incr A m p -> P m p
domok_single : forall (A : Set) (x : Map A) (T : mEnsemble A), T x -> prechain_dom_ok A T (single A x)
incr_concat : forall (A : Set) (x : Map A) (r : mRelation A) (p : prechain A), r (prechain_last A p) x -> prechain_incr A r p -> prechain_incr A r (concat A p x)
Inductive prechain_incr (A : Set) : mRelation A -> prechain A -> Prop := incr_single : forall (x : Map A) (r : mRelation A), prechain_incr A r (single A x) | incr_concat : forall (x : Map A) (r : mRelation A) (p : prechain A), r (prechain_last A p) x -> prechain_incr A r p -> prechain_incr A r (concat A p x) For prechain_incr: Argument scopes are [type_scope _ _] For incr_single: Argument scopes are [type_scope _ _] For incr_concat: Argument scopes are [type_scope _ _ _ _ _]
incr_single : forall (A : Set) (x : Map A) (r : mRelation A), prechain_incr A r (single A x)
prechain_sum : forall (A : Set) (p : prechain A), (exists x : Map A, p = single A x) \/ (exists (x : Map A) (y : prechain A), p = concat A y x)
prechain_ind : forall (A : Set) (P : prechain A -> Prop), (forall m : Map A, P (single A m)) -> (forall p : prechain A, P p -> forall m : Map A, P (concat A p m)) -> forall p : prechain A, P p
prechain_rec : forall (A : Set) (P : prechain A -> Set), (forall m : Map A, P (single A m)) -> (forall p : prechain A, P p -> forall m : Map A, P (concat A p m)) -> forall p : prechain A, P p
prechain_rect : forall (A : Set) (P : prechain A -> Type), (forall m : Map A, P (single A m)) -> (forall p : prechain A, P p -> forall m : Map A, P (concat A p m)) -> forall p : prechain A, P p
Pos.iter_swap : forall (p : positive) (A : Type) (f : A -> A) (x : A), Pos.iter f (f x) p = f (Pos.iter f x p)
ssrbool.pred_of_mem = fun (T : Type) '(ssrbool.Mem p) (x : T) => p x : forall T : Type, ssrbool.mem_pred T -> ssrbool.pred_sort (ssrbool.predPredType T) Argument T is implicit and maximally inserted Argument scopes are [type_scope _]
Pos.iter_swap_gen : forall (A B : Type) (f : A -> B) (g : A -> A) (h : B -> B), (forall a : A, f (g a) = h (f a)) -> forall (p : positive) (a : A), f (Pos.iter g a p) = Pos.iter h (f a) p
ZMicromega.Vars.Facts.MP.fold_empty : forall (A : Type) (f : FSetPositive.PositiveSet.elt -> A -> A) (i : A), FSetPositive.PositiveSet.fold f FSetPositive.PositiveSet.empty i = i
mini : forall A : Set, mRelation A -> mEnsemble A -> Map A -> Prop
maxi : forall A : Set, mRelation A -> mEnsemble A -> Map A -> Prop
Operators_Properties.clos_t1n_trans : forall (A : Type) (R : Relation_Definitions.relation A) (x y : A), Relation_Operators.clos_trans_1n A R x y -> Relation_Operators.clos_trans A R x y
Relation_Operators.t_step : forall (A : Type) (R : Relation_Definitions.relation A) (x y : A), R x y -> Relation_Operators.clos_trans A R x y
mLattice : forall A : Set, mRelation A -> mEnsemble A -> Map A -> Map A -> Prop
ZMicromega.Vars.Facts.MP.fold_1b : forall (s : FSetPositive.PositiveSet.t) (A : Type) (i : A) (f : FSetPositive.PositiveSet.elt -> A -> A), FSetPositive.PositiveSet.Empty s -> FSetPositive.PositiveSet.fold f s i = i
Relation_Operators.t_trans : forall (A : Type) (R : Relation_Definitions.relation A) (x y z : A), Relation_Operators.clos_trans A R x y -> Relation_Operators.clos_trans A R y z -> Relation_Operators.clos_trans A R x z
ssrbool.PredType : forall T pred_sort : Type, (pred_sort -> ssrbool.pred T) -> ssrbool.predType T
MapCard_Put_1 : forall (A : Type) (m : Map A) (a : ad) (y : A), MapCard A (MapPut A m a y) = MapCard A m -> {y0 : A | MapGet A m a = Some y0}
Variant mem_pred (T : Type) : Type := Mem : ssrbool.pred T -> ssrbool.mem_pred T For Mem: Argument T is implicit For mem_pred: Argument scope is [type_scope] For Mem: Argument scopes are [type_scope _]
ssrbool.memPredType : forall T : Type, ssrbool.predType T
Map_rect : forall (A : Type) (P : Map A -> Type), P (M0 A) -> (forall (a : ad) (a0 : A), P (M1 A a a0)) -> (forall m : Map A, P m -> forall m0 : Map A, P m0 -> P (M2 A m m0)) -> forall m : Map A, P m
concat : forall A : Set, prechain A -> Map A -> prechain A
BinPosDef.Pos.iter = fun (A : Type) (f : A -> A) => fix iter_fix (x : A) (n : positive) {struct n} : A := match n with | (n'~1)%positive => f (iter_fix (iter_fix x n') n') | (n'~0)%positive => iter_fix (iter_fix x n') n' | 1%positive => f x end : forall A : Type, (A -> A) -> A -> positive -> A Argument A is implicit and maximally inserted Argument scopes are [type_scope function_scope _ positive_scope]
MapCard_Put1_equals_2 : forall (A : Type) (p : positive) (a a' : ad) (y y' : A), MapCard A (MapPut1 A a y a' y' p) = 2
Ptestbit_Pbit : forall (p : positive) (n : nat), Pos.testbit p (N.of_nat n) = Pos.testbit_nat p n
Pos.mul_lt_mono_r : forall p q r : positive, (q < r)%positive < -> (q * p < r * p)%positive
Pos.mul_compare_mono_r : forall p q r : positive, (q * p ?= r * p)%positive = (q ?= r)%positive
single : forall A : Set, Map A -> prechain A
prechain_last : forall A : Set, prechain A -> Map A
chain_length : forall A : Set, prechain A -> nat

``` 
intros A T r p Hchain. induction Hchain.
- apply domok_single. assumption.
- apply domok_concat.
  + apply H.
  + apply IHHchain.
```
